title: Properties of core-EP matrices and binary relationships
authors: Ehsan Kheirandish, Abbas Salemi, N\'estor Thome
abstract:
In this paper, various properties of core-EP matrices are investigated. We
introduce the MPDMP matrix associated with $A$ and by means of it, some
properties and equivalent conditions of core-EP matrices can be obtained. Also,
properties of MPD, DMP, and CMP inverses are studied and we prove that in the
class of core-EP matrices, DMP, MPD, and Drazin inverses are the same.
Moreover, DMP and MPD binary relation orders are introduced and the
relationship between these orders and other binary relation orders are
considered.
